## 3d-tiles-validator package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ValidationIssue](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissue.md) | **_(BETA)_** A class summarizing the information about an issue that was encountered during the validation process. |
|  [ValidationIssueFilters](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilters.md) | **_(BETA)_** Methods related to <code>ValidationIssueFilter</code> instances. |
|  [ValidationOptions](./3d-tiles-validator.validationoptions.md) | <p>**_(BETA)_** A class describing the options for a validator within a <code>ValidationContext</code></p><p>Note: Some aspects of this class are preliminary. The exact options and their representation in this class may still change.</p> |
|  [ValidationResult](./3d-tiles-validator.validationresult.md) | <p>**_(BETA)_** A class summarizing the result of a validation pass.</p><p>It mainly summarizes a set of <code>ValidationIssue</code> instances.</p> |
|  [Validators](./3d-tiles-validator.validators.md) | **_(BETA)_** Utility methods related to <code>Validator</code> instances. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ValidationIssueFilter](./3d-tiles-validator.validationissuefilter.md) | <p>**_(BETA)_** A predicate that is used for filtering issues that are contained in a <code>ValidationResult</code>.</p><p>It receives the "stack" of issues, i.e. the path leading from the top-level issue through its 'causes', and returns whether the leaf issue (i.e. the last element of the issues stack) should be included in the filtered result.</p> |
